page_content:
11  |  Our Approach to ESG
Priority Assessment* 
In 2021, we conducted our first-ever priority assessment. We 
engaged employees, customers, carriers and investors to help 
identify and understand which ESG topics are most critical to 
our company, industry and stakeholders. With these results, in 
2022, we developed an ESG Roadmap that will help guide our 
ESG journey moving forward. 
*Previously referred to as "materiality assessment"
